description: Take instant ramen noodles to the next level with this easy dinner idea. This ramen recipe is ready in four simple steps and takes only 20 minutes to make.
name: Mushroom & Beef Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 260 g Nong Shim Shin ramyun instant noodle black
1 bunch baby pak choy Asian greens

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mixture among bowls. Top with beef and serve garnished with spring onion and chilli.
